body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a doctor and farmer in Mercer County. Owned thirteen slaves in 1860.

Spouse: Mary A Tomlinson
Children: Bettie A Tomlinson, Mary B Tomlinson, William H Tomlinson, Albert J Tomlinson
